messages.title: Winning for Dudley South
messages.content: Jon Bramall is asking for your support to join Dudley and Stafford Street in the Euro elections. Local issues have escalated including trying to save Brierley Hill, improving Kingswinford High School, and keeping Macdonalds empire out. Born and brought up in the Borough, Jon wants to keep its unique place

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fair taxes – those on lower & middle incomes should pay less.
A fair, green economy with jobs that last.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A fair chance for every child - smaller classes & extra money for education.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Nick Clegg, Jon Bramall and the Liberal Democrats are heading for shock victories in this election.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jon Bramall is asking for your support to join Dudley and Stafford Street in the Euro elections. Local issues have escalated including trying to save Brierley Hill, improving Kingswinford High School, and keeping MacDonald's empire out. Born and brought up in the Borough, Jon wants to keep its unique place.

contactInformation.address: 1520 Victoria Street, Wall Heath, Kingswinford, West Midlands, DY6 0HZ

endorsements.endorsement: Nick Clegg, Jon Bramall and the Liberal Democrats are heading for shock victories in this election.
